description:
Indicates a possible situation, which will be confirmed by the relevant events later on. This is different from an unconfirmed event, as in we are only raising a possibility of the event, the event itself may never happen. The contents of the Data field depend on the presence of a Participant field in the action. If present, we indicate a possible event linked to that participant. It not present, we indicate a possible event for the game in itself. Fields are annotated with `Participant event` or `Game event` if relevant.
This action is *confirmed automatically* and will not be followed up with a confirmation message.
title: possible
